productBaseInfoV1.title: NIKON L28 Point & Shoot Camera(Silver)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Nikon Cameras are supposed to be the most widely used devices by photographers the world over. This is mainly due to the fact that they are mostly user friendly and are designed in such a manner that they are easy to operate. The Coolpix L28 by Nikon is a great camera for beginners and it can also serve as an emergency backup camera for photographers. Sensor Technology This camera is equipped with a powerful 20 MP CCD image sensor. This image sensor is very handy for low light photography as the high quality sensor allows in more light than the older chips that were in use before. The 20 MP that it delivers allows you to take high quality shots that have stunning levels of detail in them. The CCD image sensor that the camera uses is also capable of high quality images without the need to constantly change the ISO settings according to the lighting conditions. Nikkor Inside Most cameras by Nikon are built around the lens, thereby giving the lens prime importance when designing a whole camera around it. The Coolpix L28 has been designed in this fashion, where the Nikkor Glass with Zoom can get you much closer to the action without you having to move physically closer to the subject. The 5 X Wide Angle lens is ideal for a wide range of situations and scenes. The proprietary Nikkor lenses are highly reliable and accurate no matter what camera they are for. The Nikon is capable of 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom as well. Simple to Use The hassle free approach to photography is possible with the Nikon Coolpix camera as it is designed to be user friendly no matter what your skill level may be. The in-built 3 inch TFT LCD screen with Anti-reflection coating allows for immediate reviewing of all pictures taken. The Easy Auto feature or the Scene Selector  is handy for beginners as you only need to point and shoot, the camera will adjust all the settings automatically. The camera is also equipped with over 20 scene modes. The Camera is capable of taking HD videos in 720 p resolution.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 70 Instant Camera (Yellow)(Yellow)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Capture, print, and share photos instantaneously with the Fujifilm Instax Mini 70 Instant Camera. Design You can also be a part of a group photo as this camera lets you capture one or two frames in continuous shooting. The tripod socket in this camera lets you mount the camera so you can click steady and stable images. Thanks to the fill-in flash, you won't miss capturing important details while clicking photos in dimly lit conditions. Selfie Mode Click amazing selfies wherever you go with this instant camera. The Selfie Mode provides appropriate brightness and shooting distance while clicking self-portraits. There is a mirror next to the lens which can be used to check your framing before clicking the photo. Automatic Exposure Control Even in the dark, the Mini 70 Instant Camera can capture photos with bright backgrounds and bright subjects. It features a high-performance flash that adjusts shutter speed by automatically calculating the surrounding brightness, without requiring any special settings. Hi-key mode Capture bright skin tones of your subject when you click photos using the Hi-key mode. This camera is the ideal way to practice your portrait photography skills. Features In the macro mode, you can capture your subject from 0.3 meters to 0.6 meters away. You can also shoot images of landscapes and large areas using the landscape mode. The landscape mode is perfect to shoot images which are greater than 3 meters away.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SONY DSC-H100 Point & Shoot Camera
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Advanced Point and Shoot cameras are great for people who are still getting into the hang of photography though still unsure of how to use a DSLR effectively. The Sony DSC H100 is the perfect camera for beginners and intermediates alike. For intermediates, this will work well as a secondary camera or a backup camera. Super Sensor The camera comes equipped with a Super HAD CCD Sensor that has 16.1 effective MPs for high quality and detailed images. This is a great sensor for photography across varying situations that entail different lighting and scene conditions. The inbuilt HAD CCD sensor is highly capable even in low light conditions as long as the hand that clicks the image is steady. The camera also comes with the Intelligent Auto mode that makes shooting images that much more convenient and fun. This mode is also useful for when you need to quickly shoot an image or risk losing out on the moment. Zoom it In As is with most advanced point and shoot cameras, even in the Sony device, magnification is of prime importance right after picture quality. The Sony DSC camera however places Magnification and Picture Quality together by offering a whopping 21 X of Optical Zoom. Optical zoom offers more precision and clarity over digital zoom as it involves actual magnification rather than pixel manipulation as is the case with digital zoom cameras. The Wide Zoom also covers 25 mm to 525 mm. HD Recording You can use the highly capable camera for recording movies and videos at 720 pixels. This HD recording will come in handy for when you want to record your precious memories in video rather than simply taking pictures. The high quality HD recording capability of the camera can also be used to document important corporate events or formal parties as the camera is more than capable of handling the situation. Clear Photo LCD The Clear Photo LCD screen that comes with the Sony DSC H100 camera is a high quality feature that can support 460 thousand dots which translates into a very highly detailed image preview on the camera screen itself. This is handy for photographers as they will be able to quickly gauge the quality of the image before they decide if it needs to be re-shot or not. Apart from helping in preview, it will also come in handy for when you need to decide which image stays and which needs to be deleted.

productBaseInfoV1.title: FUJIFILM AX500 Point & Shoot Camera(Red)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: From Fujifilm’s popular A-series comes the FinePix AX500 point-and-shoot digital camera, which has all the necessary features and functions to transform the concept of digital photography into a very affordable, easy and convenient possibility. This makes the entry-level AX500 a perfect choice for those looking to start from the very basics in digital photography. This Fujifilm point and shoot digital camera features a Fujinon lens with a focal length of 5.9 - 29.5mm or 35 mm equivalent of 33 – 165 mm. Featuring a 5x optical zoom and an additional 6.7x of digital zoom, the AX500 is capable of considerable levels of overall magnification. The advent of a very capable CCD image sensor with a primary colour filter gives this digital camera a brilliant resolution of 14 megapixels. With a total weight of 168 g which includes the batteries and the memory card, this Fujifilm camera becomes increasingly portable and easy to carry around, even in the comfort of your pocket. The 14 megapixel resolution along with the CCD image sensor gives this camera the ability to record HD videos with 1280 x 720 resolution at 30 fps with monaural sound capture with both PAL and NTSC output options. These high resolution images and videos can be viewed on the FinePix AX500’s 2.7 inch colour display that boasts a display resolution of 230,000 dots. This LCD colour display also doubles as a live viewfinder as this Fujifilm camera does not come with an optical viewfinder. Battery and Storage This Fujifilm FinePix is powered either by 2 AA alkaline batteries or 2 AA Ni-MH (Nickel-metal hydride) batteries as an alternative. In the auto mode the AA alkaline batteries can power the AX500 for up to 180 shots while the Ni-MH batteries can last for up to an amazing 480 shots. All the captured images and the recorded videos are saved on the AX500’s memory medium which is in the form of an SD or an SDHC memory card. The transfer of saved files from the camera’s memory device to a PC or a laptop is done via its high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface. Performance The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that is allowed to fall on the image sensor, which in this Fujifilm camera ranges from f/3.3 to f/5.9. It also features an autofocus function with a range that spans from 45 cm (Wide) and 80 cm (Tele) to infinity. It also has a macro focus range of 10 cm - 80 cm on wide and 60 cm - 1 m on tele. The light sensitivity of this camera ranges from ISO 100 to 3200, giving you clear images irrespective of the available lighting conditions. The AX500 also features a wide range of adjustable shutter speeds that range from a maximum 1/1400 sec to a minimum of 8 sec. A built-in flash with auto and manual adjustment modes lets you control the intensity of the flash, with a range of 60 cm to 3 m (Wide) and 60 cm to 2 m (Tele). This when clubbed with Red Eye Reduction makes it possible to capture clear and sharp images even under low light. Features The intelligent auto scene mode identifies the scene you're shooting, be it portrait, landscape, night portrait, macro, or sport and automatically adjusts the camera's settings for optimum results. With 6 pre-set white balancing options to choose from, the AX500 lets you choose from a variety of image tone and temperature settings. This FinePix also sports a digital image stabilizer that makes sure that the captured images and videos are sharp and blur free. The AX500 also comes with face detection that automatically detects human faces within the frame, so that maximum priority is given to the clarity of the faces rather than other elements. The PictBridge technology lets you connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy and direct photo printing. The self-timer mode lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, making this a very convenient option for self-portraits and group shots. The continuous mode lets the FinePix AX500 shoot at a maximum speed of 1.2 frames per second.

productBaseInfoV1.title: NIKON L26 Point & Shoot Camera(Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Everyday photography can be a lot of fun when you have the ideal camera to keep you company while you’re chronicling the moments of your life. The Nikon Coolpix L26 is a handy camera that belongs to the Life series of point and shoot digital cameras from Nikon. The L26 is easy to use and is ideal for those who are new to the hobby of photography. The Coolpix L26 features a focal length of 4.6 - 23 mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 130 mm. The camera sports an optical zoom of 5x and digital zoom of 4x. The CCD image sensor of the Nikon L26 lets you take pictures at a 16.1 megapixel resolution. The compact Nikon L26 is designed for an increased level of comfort. The L26 weighs 164 g and can be slipped into your pocket and easily carried around, even in crowds or when you’re in a hurry. The buttons are all grouped closely on the back panel, making menu changes easy even when you’re in the middle of taking a photograph. You can record every moment of your precious memories in high definition video quality. The HD video mode captures footage at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps. The EXPEED C2 image processor lets you take high quality photographs with minimum noise (grains). The 3 inch TFT LCD screen enables you to preview and compose your images every time, ensuring that your photographs reflect your memories perfectly. Battery and Storage Photographs taken with this Nikon point and shoot camera are stored in SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. For further space, you can transfer images from the camera to a computer or PC using the high speed USB port of the Coolpix L26. This Nikon camera is powered by 2 AA size alkaline batteries that let you take up to 200 images on full charge. You can alternately use 2 Lithium Ion or rechargeable NiMh batteries and take up to 680 or 350 shots respectively, on full charge. Performance The Nikon Coolpix L26 has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 6.5, which is the measure of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor of the camera. The Auto Focus feature of the camera lets you focus in the range of 50 cm to infinity (Wide) and 80 cm onwards (Tele). The camera sports a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600, which indicates that the camera is acutely sensitive to light and can take images in most light conditions. The Coolpix L26 has a shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode. This lets you take spectacular images of lights in the dark. The built-in flash of this Nikon digital camera has a functioning range of 0.5 - 3.6 m (Wide) and 0.8 - 1.7 m (Tele), lighting up your subject dramatically for clear and sharp images, whether at dawn or dusk. Features Pictures taken in standard and popular settings will now be more breathtaking, with the 21 shooting modes available in this camera. These include Food, Museum, Panorama, Snow mode and more. In Food mode, the settings are optimized to make food look healthier and juicier, enhancing your photographs immeasurably. The electronic Vibration Reduction feature ensures that your pictures are stable and blur-free. The Face Detection feature detects faces in the frame and ensures that the focus and exposure settings are optimum to catch them in sharp relief. The Smile Timer function captures a shot the instant it recognizes a smiling subject in the frame. In Blink Proof mode, the Coolpix L26 lets you know when a subject has blinked, letting you take another image to replace the earlier one. The self-timer of this Nikon digital point and shoot camera lets you delay shutter release by 10 seconds, so that you never have to miss out on being in a picture with your friends and family ever again. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 4 images at 1.2 frames per second, and record long sequences in action for quirky and memorable photographs.

productBaseInfoV1.title: NIKON L28 Point & Shoot Camera(Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Nikon Cameras are supposed to be the most widely used devices by photographers the world over. This is mainly due to the fact that they are mostly user friendly and are designed in such a manner that they are easy to operate. The Coolpix L28 by Nikon is a great camera for beginners and it can also serve as an emergency backup camera for photographers. Sensor Technology This camera is equipped with a powerful 20 MP CCD image sensor. This image sensor is very handy for low light photography as the high quality sensor allows in more light than the older chips that were in use before. The 20 MP that it delivers allows you to take high quality shots that have stunning levels of detail in them. The CCD image sensor that the camera uses is also capable of high quality images without the need to constantly change the ISO settings according to the lighting conditions. Nikkor Inside Most cameras by Nikon are built around the lens, thereby giving the lens prime importance when designing a whole camera around it. The Coolpix L28 has been designed in this fashion, where the Nikkor Glass with Zoom can get you much closer to the action without you having to move physically closer to the subject. The 5 X Wide Angle lens is ideal for a wide range of situations and scenes. The proprietary Nikkor lenses are highly reliable and accurate no matter what camera they are for. The Nikon is capable of 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom as well. Simple to Use The hassle free approach to photography is possible with the Nikon Coolpix camera as it is designed to be user friendly no matter what your skill level may be. The in-built 3 inch TFT LCD screen with Anti-reflection coating allows for immediate reviewing of all pictures taken. The Easy Auto feature or the Scene Selector  is handy for beginners as you only need to point and shoot, the camera will adjust all the settings automatically. The camera is also equipped with over 20 scene modes. The Camera is capable of taking HD videos in 720 p resolution.

productBaseInfoV1.title: NIKON Coolpix L23 Point & Shoot Camera(Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Nikon Coolpix L23 is an entry level compact digital camera. L23 is a 10.1 megapixel camera and is powered by EXPEED C2 Image Processing Engine. This Coolpix camera is equipped with a 5x optical zoom NIKKOR lens and has 28mm (35mm format equivalent) focal length. Body The Nikon L23 weighs 170g and has dimension of 96.7 x 59.9 x 29.3 mm. The camera features a 2.7-inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. The Coolpix L23 has an internal memory of 22MB and supports external memory cards such as SD, SDHC and SDXC. The camera comes with LR6/L40 alkaline battery, which can take up to 250 pictures. A user can also use rechargeable Ni-MH Battery EN-MH2 and FR6/L91 lithium battery, which can click up to 250 pictures and 660 pictures, respectively. Performance The Nikon Coolpix L23 can zoom up to 5x optically and 4x digitally. This camera has a Focus range of 30cm in normal mode and 3cm in macro mode. The camera has auto ISO sensitivity ranging from ISO 80-1600. The internal Flash has various modes such as Auto, Auto with red-eye reduction, Flash Off, Fill flash and Slow sync. Features and Connectivity Coolpix 23 features various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, and Panorama assist. The camera features three image stabilization options: electronic vibration reduction (VR), motion detection and Best Shot Selector (BSS) to give good quality images. A user can setup self timer for 10 seconds and shoot in a continuous mode at 1.4 fps for up to 4 shots. The Nikon Coolpix L23 can record movie in VGA format at 30 fps. The camera supports AVI movie format and JPEG image format. In terms of connectivity, the camera uses USB cable.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SJCAM 4K SJ5000X Elite WiFi 4K 24fps 2K30fps Gyro Sports DV 2.0 LCD NTK96660 Diving 30m Waterproof Sports and Action Camera(Yellow, 12 MP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The SJCAM SJ5000x is SJCAM's most feature robust Action Camera to date. Upgrading to 12.4mp Sony IMX078 Sensor, Adding Adjustable Viewing angles (70-170 Degrees), and 4K Video record at 24 frames per second (4K24) are all new features packed into the SJCAM SJ5000x Elite Edition - Be the First. SJ5000x Elite Adopts the Sony IMX078 sensor for Fast image processing Speed The SJCAM SJ5000x Elite ups the ante for the Action Camera marking by adopting the very stable and fast processing speed Sony IMX078cqk image processor. The IMX078 has back-illuminated 12.40M-effective pixel CMOS image sensor to achieve higher resolution from the 12.40M effective pixels. SJ5000x Elite: 4Kat 24fps 2Kat 30fps with Gyro Stabilization The SJ5000x Elite Edition supports 4K 3840x2160 Hi-res video recording to capture your most memorable moments. Whether you are using the SJ5000x as a FPV Aerial Photography, Capturing priceless family and friend "SJCAM Moments" or as a Dashcam, the SJCAM video quality will never let you down. Gyro Stabilization sensor chip has been added to the SJ5000x allowing it to edit out bumpy parts. SJCAM Zone for SJ5000x Elite: Control, Capture, Share via WiFi SJCAM Zone App by SJCAM allows you to control your SJ5000x with the touch of your iPhone, Android phone or Tablet PC. Remotely control functions and setting; You can also capture photos, record video, or transfer files. The UI is very easy to use.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SONY DSC-W730 Point & Shoot Camera(Green)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Compact cameras are more effective as ready cameras due to one simple fact; they are always there when you need them, as they can be switched on and made ready within a matter of seconds. The Sony Cyber Shot camera is the best choice for beginners who want to learn more about photography. Sensor Technology This camera is equipped with a high performance 16.1 MP Super HAD CCD sensor that can be used for high performance photography. The sensor is also well suited for low light photography. Lens Arrangement The compact camera is equipped with a high quality Carl Zeiss lens that comes with a zoom capability of 8 X in the optical range. Optical zooming is far superior to digital zoom as it allows you to zoom without compromising on the quality of the image. High Definition Movie Shooting This camera is capable of shooting movies in High Definition format with a resolution of 720 p. This is also supported by the Active Steady Shot which comes in handy for unsteady situations where you will need to keep an eye on your footing as well as on the subject. Intelligent Auto Mode This camera is also incorporated with an intelligent auto mode that can come in handy for those who wish to only enjoy taking in the scenes and not bother much about the settings of the camera. Creative Effects This camera also consists of a few creative effects that come with it, which makes it ideal for use with creative photography. These Beauty Effects can be applied to portraits and also for some other scenes. There are also a host of different picture effects that can help bring your creative clicks to life. Display Technology The camera is incorporated with a high quality 2.7 inch LCD screen that can serve as the viewfinder as well as the primary means to review all your clicked pictures. The flash is also quite advanced in the Sony Cyber Shot camera as it can be used as and when necessary according to the situation around the subject.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Designed with a unique handwheel on its control panel, Smooth 3 allows various camera settings in fingertips, including exposure compensation, ISO, white balance, shutter speed and focusing, rendering real-time precise control of both the camera and stabilizer. Empowered by the 5th Instune Algorithmic System which realizes 40% increase in motor torque and 35% improvement in respond speed compared to previous versions, Smooth 3 sets up a new benchmark in the industry supporting a max. payload of 260g. This not only significantly improves its system stability, but also allows more extensive phone shooting applications with various add-on options, such as external lens, portable lamp or microphone.. A 5V/1000mA power output port on Smooth 3 allows convenient real-time charging to smartphone, enhancing both the portability and practicability of phone-shooting to utmost extent. The newly upgraded smartphone APP - ZY Play - not only allows customized parameter settings for photo/video shooting and gimbal controls, allowing more subtle adjustments with exposure compensation, ISO, white balance and multi-style filters etc., but further supports multiple intelligent functions, including time lapse, long exposure, panoramic imaging and more to make your phone a real film-making device.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SONY DSC-WX150 Point & Shoot Camera(Red)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Point and Shoot cameras are great for home based photography and also for capturing memorable moments on outings and other special occasions where high powered DSLRs are not required. Sensor Technology This Sony Cyber Shot camera is equipped with a high quality 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS sensor that can function well under almost all lighting conditions. Even in terms of low light conditions, if you can achieve a steady grip and a firm focus, you can manage to get decent pictures. Zoom Levels and Lens Arrangement This camera by Sony is equipped with a high quality lens arrangement that allows you to have an Optical Zoom level of 10 X. Having the option of optical zoom is more functional than going in for digital zoom. High Speed Auto Focus This is a great feature to have in a point and shoot camera as it allows for some high speed reactions when the opportune moment presents itself before you. With the High Speed Auto Focus mode, you can be sure that the camera will not waste too much time in focusing on the subject. You can thus easily take the shot and never miss another moment. Steadily Does it The Improved Optical SteadyShot feature is another great function of the camera. It allows you to optically stabilize the image before you click it and thus, create a beautiful shot every time. Creative Modes This camera by Sony is just the right fit for the creative one in you. It comes with 9 different Picture Effects that can add new life to your clicked images. This will allow you to explore your creative side and is also best suited for sharing on social networking web sites. Size Does Matter This camera is a slim offering by Sony, allowing you to carry it with you almost anywhere you may go.

productBaseInfoV1.title: NIKON L820 Advanced Point & Shoot Camera(Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Image Sensor The Nikon Coolpix camera is a highly popular advanced point and shoot device that can be used as a bridge between a compact point and shoot camera and a full fledged DSLR camera. It comes equipped with a highly capable 16 MP low light capable CMOS Sensor that can function beautifully at a wide range of lighting conditions. Zoom in Close Being an advanced point and shoot device, it comes equipped with a highly capable Nikkor ED Lens. This lens is made with high precision and comes with an optical zoom level of 30 X. This is a great range of zoom as it allows you to use the optics and not the sensor and receptor to get a magnification. The optical zoom allows for light focusing whereas the digital zoom involves simple magnification of the pixels, which result in pixilated images. Display Monitor Technology This camera is equipped with a high quality 3 inch VGA LCD display that lets you preview your captured images. This helps you decide if more shots are required or if you can simply move onto the next subject. The LCD screen also lets you view and compose the image before you actually shoot it, much like the viewfinder of the camera. Full HD Recording This camera is equipped with the ability to take high quality crystal clear HD videos at a resolution of 1080 pixels. The exceptional video and picture quality can be seen when the camera is connected to an HD TV. The camera is also equipped with a microphone that can record stereo sound. This is important when having high quality videos. Other Features The camera is equipped with the Lens-shift Vibration Reduction feature for high image quality. This allows for precise and life-like images thanks to the EXPEED C2 image-processing engine. It is also easier to carry around thanks to the larger ergonomic design that lets you handle it easily.

productBaseInfoV1.title: NIKON D5100 DSLR Camera
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Nikon D5100, is a member of the popular series meant for the entry level enthusiastic photographer. You can not only take great pictures with it, but you can also record videos in Full-HD mode at 1920 x 1080 p. Horizontal Swing The Nikon D5100 is equipped with a variety of features that can help during photography sessions spanning a range of conditions and situations. Functions like the Horizontal Swing mode add a level of flexibility to the abilities of a photographer. Swivel that Monitor The viewing screen of the camera is designed in such a manner that it allows for a variable angle of swing. This gives you ample opportunities to take pictures no matter how and where the subject is located. Special Effects Mode Photography is all about creativity and self expression, which is a fact as seen by the images that get captured by passionate lensmen. The Nikon camera can also augment the pictures with a host of special effects that can be configured on it through the special effects mode. Some of these effects can be, Selective Color, Color Sketch and also the Miniature Effect. High Speed Shooting When you come across that perfect shot, there are instances where you know instinctively that one picture just won’t cut it. Use the camera’s High Speed Continuous Shooting mode to capture the whole series of events in high quality details. Silent Shutter This camera by Nikon is also equipped with a revolutionary new Silent Shutter mechanism that greatly reduces the sound made by the mechanical shutter commonly used by DSLR cameras. The lack of loud sounds associated with the shutter release will allow for better photography thanks to less distractions and miniscule vibrations caused by the excess noise, as sound after all, is derived from vibrations. Sensor Technology This Nikon camera is equipped with a high quality DX format CMOS image processing Sensor that is capable of taking high quality images thanks to the camera’s excellent lenses. The CMOS image sensor is also more advanced than previous forms of sensors used by Nikon as it allows for greater details and colour reproductions.

productBaseInfoV1.title: OLYMPUS TG-5(12 MP, 4x Optical Zoom, 4x Digital Zoom, Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Designed for the adventurous type, the black Tough TG-5 Digital Camera from Olympus is a durable point-and-shoot with a rugged physical construction and apt imaging capabilities. Utilizing a 12MP BSI CMOS sensor and TruePic VIII image processor, the TG-5 offers notable image clarity and low-light performance, to ISO 12800, along with fast 20 fps continuous shooting, 4K/30p video recording, and high-speed Full HD 1080p shooting at 120 fps. Balancing the imaging capabilities is a versatile 4x optical zoom lens, which spans a 25-100mm equivalent range, and has an f/2 maximum aperture to benefit working in low-light conditions. Additionally, the Variable Macro System also positions this lens for close-up shooting with subjects just one centimeter away for true macro photography. Complementing the sensor and optical attributes of the TG-5 is a robust set of features for withstanding the elements, tracking your adventures, and sharing your images. The camera is rated for underwater use, as well as tested to withstand falls and crushing, and is hermetically sealed against dust and moisture for assured use in trying conditions. Making use of these stats, a Field Sensor System incorporates GPS, a manometer, compass, and a thermometer for recording the details of your environment and embedding this data onto your photos and movies. Using built-in Wi-Fi and the OI.Track app, the recording log data and the imagery can be shared to a mobile device for compositing and sharing online.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Smiledrive Trail Camera: Wildlife Trail Camera with Night Vision, PIR Sensor Wildlife Trail Camera with Night Vision, PIR Sensor, Fast Trigger Speed: 16MP 1080p 38pcs 940nM Infrared LEDs, 2.0” LCD Screen Sports and Action Camera(Green, 16 MP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Get great wildlife shots and videos without animals realizing it with Smiledrive Wild Life Trail Camera. This professional wildlife camera delivers full HD image quality with 16MP resolution & 1080p HD Video quality. 38 Pcs 940nm IR LEDs helps to capture video from 65 feet( 20m) during night time. An impressively fast trigger speed of less than 0.8second ensure each detected movement is captured quickly and accurately. It is Waterproof, Dustproof, Works with DC-IN 6V Power supply or AA batteries (not included) . Key Features: 1) GET GREAT SHOTS OF WILD ANIMALS, WITHOUT ANIMALS REALIZING: Fix it at a place where animals usually congregate and get amazing natural wildlife and shots/videos. This wildlife camera takes picture and video at every trigger event in ‘cam+video’ mode. 38 Pcs 940nm IR LEDs helps to capture video from 65 feet( 20m) during night time 2) 16MP WITH 1080P RESOLUTION, 120° WIDE VIEW , BUILT-IN 2.0” TFT SCREEN & 32GB MICROSD CARD SLOT: This professional wildlife camera delivers full HD image quality with 16MP resolution & 1080p HD Video quality. 120° wide angled lens captures a wide view. Comes with a built-in 2.0” screen & 32GB MicroSD card slot (card not included) 3) FAST TRIGGER SPEED & LOW POWER CONSUMPTION: An impressively fast trigger speed of less than 0.8second ensure each detected movement is captured quickly and accurately. 4) 940NM INVISIBLE INFRARED TECHNOLOGY: Fully automatic IR filter captures natural behavior of wild-animals by using infrared flash illumination technology equipped with 38 LEDs. Trigger distance and IR flash range both up to 20m (65ft). You can get great shots of a passing animal in total darkness, without the animal realizing its being documented 5) WATERPROOF, DUSTPROOF, WORKS WITH DC-IN 6V POWER SUPPLY OR AA BATTERIES (NOT INCLUDED): It is IP54 waterproof camera and can take rain as well as dusty harsh environments. 8pcs AA batteries (not included) can give it a standby life of 3-6 months. It also supports 6V DC connection

productBaseInfoV1.title: SJCAM SJ4000 (with Sports Kit) Sports and Action Camera(Black, 12 MP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Designed for point-of-view style action shooting, the black SJ4000 Action Camera from SJCAM records 1080p video and takes 12MP still photos. It features an assortment of mounts to cover just about every situation, including solutions for helmets, handlebars, surfboards, and more. The camera also features an underwater housing that, with a 100' depth rating, is safe to take snorkeling or on many dives. A 2" LCD screen on the back of the camera allows you to compose your shots as well as review what you've already recorded. The camera records to microSD and microSDHC memory cards up to 32GB in capacity. It records H.264 video in a .mov type file and offers 720p, VGA (848 x 480), and QVGA (640 x 480) settings in addition to 1080p Full HD. A USB port allows you to transfer footage to a computer, and there is a streaming function so you can use the camera as a webcam.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you are a fan of water sports or are interested in making some stunning underwater footage - this waterproof sports action cam is just what you need. You can easily take it snorkeling or even diving with the waterproof case (included in the package) and get to learn more about the underwater world. The action camera will record your video footage in 4K Ultra HD at 15 frames per second and capture images at 16 megapixels. With a wide angle 170 degree lens, you won't miss out on any background details and the support of 32GB on an SD card will let you store all your pics and videos right on the cam. With the 4K sports action cam, you will not only have a great device for capturing fun and exciting moments, but also a great way to share them. When it's time to show all the exciting footage with the world, you will have lots of options. Use Wi-Fi to quickly send pics and videos to friends or share them on social media. Connect the action cam to your computer with a USB cable to transfer your entire library, or simply hook up the sports cam directly to your TV via HDMI. With sports camera 1080 High-definition digital motion video recording device tailored to market demand. It has a variety of industry-leading features including digital video recording, photo shooting, audio recording, video display and detachable battery, which makes it perfect for vehicle data recording, photo-shooting, outdoor sports, home security, deep-water probing, etc., allowing you to film at anytime, anywhere. Water-resistant casing that allows you to film fascinating water sports; water-resistant up to 30 meters under water High definition screen that displays and replays fascinating videos recorded. productBaseInfoV1.title: MERLIN Wi-Fi IP Camera Lite IP Camera Camera(White)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Merlin's Wi-Fi IP Camera Lite is a security cam that can also be used for video conferencing. Featuring a simple set-up procedure, the camera can be set up from your smartphone or tablet in a few minutes. The viewing lens can be panned horizontally and vertically all through your smart devices. Monitor your house or office in real-time and footage can be saved directly on your smart devices. Overview The Wi-Fi IP Camera has a host of features like connectivity with alarm systems, notifications can be sent automatically through email and expandable memory of up to 32 GB. Coupled with video-conferencing capabilities it integrates communication with security perfectly. Added security The Wi-Fi IP camera is the ultimate solution for complete piece of mind. Installing it into your house as your main security system gives you the ability to monitor your house from anywhere in the world by being integrated with your smart devices including your smartphone, tablet, laptop and desktop. The Wi-Fi IP camera can also be programmed to set off motion detectors and has night illumination capability. An added feature is that if the motion sensors are triggered, the Wi-Fi camera will automatically send an alert to your email account to notify you. The Wi-Fi camera can even be pre-programmed to switch on and start recording at certain times of the day.

productBaseInfoV1.title: FUJIFILM Instax Mini 8 Party box Grape Instant Camera(Purple)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 8 is a film camera aimed at providing instant gratification and storing precious memories forever at the simple press of a button. This yellow coloured variant of the Mini 8 is a great addition to your travel bag and can click great quality photographs with an easy operation. Whether you’re at the beach with friends or having lunch with a loved one, this camera is perfect for encapsulating your most precious moments and carry them around wherever you go. Capturing images with the Fujifilm Instax Mini 8 is as easy as powering it on, adjusting the dial to the lit position and clicking pictures of your intended subjects. The brightness adjustment dial helps you determine the ideal exposure for any given light condition so that your pictures are always bright and clear. With a fixed shutter speed of 1/60 seconds and an always firing flash, the camera adjusts the aperture value according to the present light conditions to give you the perfect photograph every single time. Its enhanced viewfinder allows you to frame shots with greater precision than before. Taking photography one step further, you can also shoot high-key images by simply adjusting the dial to the high-key mode. Shooting pictures has never been this much fun or easy.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Zaptin wifi Camera Action camera Sports and Action Camera(Black, 16 MP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you are a fan of water sports or are interested in making some stunning underwater footage - this waterproof sports action cam is just what you need. You can easily take it snorkeling or even diving with the waterproof case (included in the package) and get to learn more about the underwater world. The action camera will record your video footage in 4K Ultra HD at 15 frames per second and capture images at 16 megapixels. With a wide angle 170 degree lens, you won't miss out on any background details and the support of 32GB on an SD card will let you store all your pics and videos right on the cam. With the 4K sports action cam, you will not only have a great device for capturing fun and exciting moments, but also a great way to share them. When it's time to show all the exciting footage with the world, you will have lots of options. Use Wi-Fi to quickly send pics and videos to friends or share them on social media. Connect the action cam to your computer with a USB cable to transfer your entire library, or simply hook up the sports cam directly to your TV via HDMI. Coming with Wi-Fi support, the cam will let you instantly send pics and videos via email or share them on social media. You can also use the USB port to transfer all the imagery onto your computer. What's more, the action camera comes with an HDMI port, letting you conveniently connect it directly to the big screen to view your footage.
